meanings.definition: Crossing or situated on the other side of the Pacific Ocean.
meanings.sent1: The transpacific journey was long but rewarding.
meanings.sent2: She booked a transpacific flight for her vacation.
meanings.sent3: The penguins decided to have a transpacific race for fun.
meanings.sent4: Their transpacific love knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The transpacific view from the cliff was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: Traveling or relating to travel across the Pacific Ocean.
meanings.sent1: The transpacific cruise was filled with exciting adventures.
meanings.sent2: He enjoyed the transpacific voyage on the luxurious ship.
meanings.sent3: The transpacific bus tour had unexpected detours.
meanings.sent4: Her transpacific dreams took her to new horizons.
meanings.sent5: The transpacific journey changed their lives forever.
